message: I'm willing to split it 90/10 in your favor, Bob.  This is a good start, and I'm confident we can work out a fair deal.
I think a 60/40 split is a fairer starting point. It acknowledges that we both have an equal right to the money, and it leaves room for negotiation in the future.
Let's try a 70/30 split. While I value fairness, I also have to be mindful of the declining value of our share over time. This compromise should be beneficial for both of us.
